main.py

```Python
from fastapi import FastAPI
from test_workflow import test

app = FastAPI(
    title="Data Services",
    description="REST API for data services",
    version="0.1.0",
)

@app.get("/")
async def root():
    return {"message": "Data Services"}

@app.get("/test")
def trigger():
    test()
    return "completed"
```

test_workflow.py

```Python
@flow()
def test():
```
